Package org.beryx.textio

Class TextIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beryx.textio.TextIO
  • public class TextIO
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating InputReaders. All InputReaders created by the same TextIO instance share the same TextTerminal.
